register.heading: Register on TeaStream
register.backButtonLabel: Already have an account? Sign in
register.usernameDescription: This is the name other users will know you by. You can change it later.
register.emailDescription: We may use your email for sending account-related notifications.
register.passwordDescription: The password must contain at least 8 characters.
register.successAlertDescription: A verification email has been sent to your inbox. If you don't see the email, check your spam folder

login.heading: Login to TeaStream
login.backButtonLabel: Don't have an account? Sign up!
login.loginDescription: Your username or email that you used during registration.
login.passwordDescription: The password you used during registration.
login.pinDescription: Enter the code from your authentication app.

resetPassword.heading: Reset password
resetPassword.backButtonLabel: Already have an account? Sign in
resetPassword.emailDescription: The email you used during registration
resetPassword.successAlertDescription: We have sent a password reset link to your email. If you have enabled Telegram notifications, the link was sent there as well

newPassword.heading: New password
newPassword.backButtonLabel: Already have an account? Sign in
newPassword.passwordDescription: The password you used during registration
newPassword.passwordRepeatDescription: Repeat your new password for confirmation
newPassword.errorMessage: Error when setting a new password

deactivate.heading: Deactivate Account
deactivate.emailDescription: Your email that you used during registration
deactivate.passwordDescription: The password you used during registration
deactivate.pinDescription: A code has been sent to your email. If you enabled Telegram notifications, we sent the code there as well
deactivate.successMessage: You have successfully deactivated your account

follow.confirmUnfollowMessage: You will no longer receive notifications from this channel and it will disappear from your followed list.

chat.heading: Chat
chat.unavailableMessage: Chat is unavailable while there is no stream on the channel. Please check back later!

confirmModal.heading: Stream Thumbnail Removal
confirmModal.message: Are you sure you want to delete the stream thumbnail? This action cannot be undone.

thumbnail.info: Supported formats: JPG, JPEG, PNG, or GIF. Max size: 10 MB.

info.titleDescription: Enter the title of your stream. It should be short and memorable.
info.categoryDescription: Select the category your content belongs to. This will help viewers find your streams more easily.
